text: Ni shuo: Xinfeng tian jing de ren a! Nimen lai ba, rang women gongtong zunshou yi zhong shuangfang renwei gongping de xintiao: Women dajia zhi chongbai zhenzhu, bu yi renhe wu pei ta, chu zhenzhu wai, bu yi tonglei wei zhuzai. Ruguo tamen beiqi zhe zhong xintiao, namo, nimen shuo: Qing nimen zuozheng women shi guishun de ren.
